00023 static unsigned char __attribute__ ((progmem)) FontGr[] =
00024 {
00025 // format is one character per line:
00026 // length, byte array[length]
00027     0x0B,0x3E,0x41,0x41,0x41,0x41,0x42,0x42,0x42,0x42,0x3C,0x00,// 0. Folder Icon
